title: The What did you think of the movie movie
creator_credit: American Film Institute and Jeremy Kagan
brief_description: This delightful satire of movie criticism covers the complete range of responses to the question in its title. In the most hilarious scenes, some of the “critics” warm up to their task and get carried away by their reactions to life on the silver screen.
